title: Weekly Market - Weekly vegetable market with open ottas, cattle market and ancillary petty convenience shops
clause_text: Weekly Market - Weekly vegetable market with open ottas, cattle market and ancillary petty convenience shops. Multipurpose Ground - Users permissible in sites reserved for Multi-purpose ground : Festival fairs, ceremonies, religious functions etc.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS
